<h3 id="X11427">X(11427)&nbsp;=&nbsp;HOMOTHETIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: ANTI-CONWAY AND ANTI-INVERSE-IN-INCIRCLE</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; SA+4*R^2-2*SW  :  :
<br>
<b>X(11427) = 3*(4*R^2-SW)*X(2)-2*SW*X(6) = (2*R^2-SW)*X(4)+2*(5*R^2-2*SW)*X(54)</b>
<p>X(11427) lies on these lines:{2,6}, {4,54}, {5,3167}, {20,3796}, {49,7528}, {51,6353}, {97,571}, {110,6997}, {140,11432}, {154,5480}, {155,7404}, {182,7386}, {371,1590}, {372,1589}, {376,11430}, {387,11109}, {389,631}, {401,7738}, {427,6776}, {436,6524}, {441,9605}, {458,5286}, {464,572}, {465,11486}, {466,11485}, {468,9777}, {472,5335}, {473,5334}, {486,8968}, {497,11429}, {511,7494}, {569,6643}, {1092,6803}, {1147,7401}, {1181,3088}, {1249,2052}, {1351,6676}, {1368,5050}, {1370,5012}, {1495,7714}, {1501,1970}, {1503,7378}, {1585,1588}, {1586,1587}, {1593,6225}, {1597,5656}, {1708,6349}, {1848,2261}, {1853,8550}, {1899,8889}, {2165,4993}, {2550,11428}, {3060,7493}, {3089,10982}, {3090,3292}, {3147,3567}, {3523,9786}, {3524,11438}, {3526,11431}, {3535,7582}, {3536,7581}, {3541,7592}, {4176,7763}, {4200,5706}, {4232,10192}, {5094,11245}, {5218,11436}, {6800,7500}, {7391,11003}, {7392,9306}, {7394,9544}, {7499,10519}, {7544,9545}, {11422,11442}, {11423,11457}</p>
<p>
X(11427) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (2,6,11433), (2,193,343), (2,1993,69), (2,1994,6515), (4,184,11206), (154,5480,6995), (427,11402,6776), (1994,6515,1992), (10601,11064,2)<br>
